structural.description: Pipes with structural grade 4 or 5 are not adoptable unless repaired.

service.description: Pipes with service grade 4 or 5 require cleaning before adoption.

banned_defects.description: Presence of these severe defects results in automatic rejection for adoption.

gradient_issues.description: Pipe gradients must conform to design drawing within 10% variance or be rejected.

requirements: No significant deviation from designed route
alignment.description: Misalignment, dips, or excessive deflection result in adoption failure.

requirements: Benching must be smooth and well-formed
No signs of infiltration or exfiltration
Covers and frames must be seated correctly
manhole_conditions.description: Poor MH construction or access chamber defects are cause for rejection.

types: CCTV Survey (compliant with MSCC5 or OS20x coding)
inspection_required.description: All pipes must pass CCTV and physical inspection before handover to Water Company.
